SESSION_ID.description: Session string/folder name used by your WhatsApp library (e.g. baileys). Leave empty to set at runtime.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Owner/admin phone number in international format (e.g. +1234567890)

MONGODB_URI.description: MongoDB connection string (optional, if you store data)

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Heroku API key (only if you use Heroku features that need the key).

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Heroku app name (optional, used with HEROKU_API_KEY).
